sections.purpose: To store media, reagents, and short-term cultures at 2–8°C.
sections.scope: Applicable to cold storage activities in Microbiology.
procedure: Verify the temperature set point and actual display.
Arrange items to allow air circulation and avoid blocking vents.
Label all stored materials with name, date, and responsible person.
Record internal temperature daily on the log sheet.
Clean shelves and interior surfaces regularly with disinfectant.
Defrost the refrigerator if excessive ice forms.
Remove expired or unused materials as per disposal SOP.
precautions: Do not store food or drink in the laboratory refrigerator.
Avoid frequent or prolonged door opening.
Do not store flammable solvents unless the unit is explosion-proof.
Ensure door seals are intact to maintain temperature.
Connect critical refrigerators to backup power if available.
